specifications.Finish: Mechanical > Bonded Bonded fabric is created by fusing two different layers into one, which improves durability. When a winter outer layer is combined with a warm lining, it enhances insulation while also supporting a structured, defined silhouette.
specifications.Care Advice: Knit When you receive a knit product, it may be stiff and wrinkled. This is because the fabric has been folded and compressed for shipping. To soften and straighten the fabric, you should condition it for 2-3 days at room temperature before using it.
specifications.Care Instructions: Hand wash only Wash separately Do not wring, Do not rub Do not bleach Line dry Do not tumble dry Do not iron Do not dry clean Performance UV Protection A treatment to reduce fabric exposure to UV rays through application of a UV blocking agent that absorbs or scatters UV rays. Brand Yarn Aerosilver® Aerosilver is a next generation multi-functional fiber providing moisture absorbent/fast drying function with antimicrobial effects. Aerosilver is a universal yarn applications range from intimate wear to sportswear. (Specification: bit.ly/4aj8s67) Creora® Creora® is a spandex with high power and excellent heat resistance, which maintains its fabric power even setting at high temperature or re-dyeing. In particular, this offers outstanding deeper color and better fastness, dyed with disperse dye stuff. Recommended Use Activewear, Leggings
